content: Credit Card Asked by Zarny TunAsked on 31 Oct 2018How can I add back my deleted credit card from under my DBS bank account section?I accidentally deleted my Credit card from under DBS section in the Seedly app. Now when I am trying to add it back by resyncing the entire bank account but the credit card no longer shows up.1 answerAnswerBump1

Leong Wen Fong, Economics and Management at University of LondonLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 Oct 2018Hi sorry I misread the question at first.What you can do is to delete the entire bank account and add it back in again!Hope this helps!0 comments1
